display_information.name: Quipper
display_information.description: Transforms quotes into witty images for your 'Overheard At' channel
display_information.long_description:
😄 Welcome to Quipper – the witty image generator that brings laughter to your 'Overheard At' channel! 🖼️

Tired of dull quotes fading into obscurity? With Quipper, those memorable quips become hilarious images that brighten up your workspace! Share your favorite quotes in the designated channel, and let Quipper work its magic, turning them into witty visuals that'll have your team chuckling in no time. 😂📷

🔧 How to Use:
1. Join the 'Overheard At' channel to start collecting quotes
2. Mention `@Quipper` followed by the quote you want to transform
3. Sit back and watch as Quipper generates a witty image instantly!

With Quipper, every snippet of conversation becomes a chance for amusement. Why settle for plain text when you can add a touch of humor to your workspace? Start creating witty images with Quipper today! 🌟😄
